results.title: Prolonged metformin treatment leads to reduced transcription of Nrf2 and neurotrophic factors without cognitive impairment in older C57BL/6J mice.
results.text_hl: Performance in the Morris water maze test of hippocampal based memory function, showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevented @<m>DISEASE_Pain_Referred</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053591 @@@impairment of spatial reference@@@ memory associated with the HF diet.

citations.NLM: Allard JS, Perez EJ, Fukui K, Carpenter P, Ingram DK, de Cabo R. Prolonged metformin treatment leads to reduced transcription of Nrf2 and neurotrophic factors without cognitive impairment in older C57BL/6J mice. Behav Brain Res. 2016 Mar 15;301():1-9. PMID: 26698400
